site_tagline: A Swiss army knife for everyone. aVToolz is a handy website containg a collection of tools to perform daily tasks. aVToolz offer tools for image conversion, file conversion, text transformation and many more..

routes.keywords: docs, doc, documentation, getting started, avToolz

routes.title: JPG To PDF Converter
routes.description:
Easily Convert JPG images to PDF.
 JPG to PDF Converter is a free online tool to convert JPG images to PDF. You can convert multiple JPG images at once and save the PDF file.

routes.title: PNG To PDF Converter
routes.description:
Easily Convert PNG images to PDF.
 PNG to PDF Converter is a free online tool to convert PNG images to PDF. You can convert multiple PNG images at once and save the PDF file.

routes.title: Merge PDF Online
routes.description:
Easily Merge PDF files.
 Merge PDF Online is a free online tool to merge multiple PDF files into a single PDF file. You can merge multiple PDF files at once and save the PDF file.

routes.title: IMG To PDF Converter
routes.description:
Easily Compress PDF files.
 Compress PDF is a free online tool to compress PDF files without losing quality and minimize the size of PDF files.
